builders.shutdown_command: sudo sh -c 'deluser vagrant && rm -rf /home/vagrant && rm -f /etc/sudoers.d/vagrant && rm -f /root/.ssh/authorized_keys && rm -f /etc/ssh/ssh_host_* && sed -i '/#VAGRANT-BEGIN/,/#VAGRANT-END/d' /etc/fstab && sed -i '/^vagrant/d' /etc/passwd- && sed -i '/^vagrant/d' /etc/shadow- && sed -i '/^vagrant/d' /etc/group- && rm -f /etc/apk/protected_paths.d/lbu.list && rm -rf /var/log/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /var/cache/apk/* && dd if=/dev/zero of=/zerofile bs=1M || true && rm -f /zerofile && rm -f /root/.ash_history && poweroff'
